statements: SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_type, case_date FROM court_cases WHERE plaintiff='Alice';
SELECT case_name, case_type, plaintiff, defendant FROM court_cases ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE plaintiff='Bob' AND defendant='Charlie';
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM court_cases WHERE case_type='Civil' ORDER BY case_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_type = 'Civil' ORDER BY case_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_type FROM court_cases WHERE defendant IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE plaintiff LIKE '%John%' AND defendant LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT case_name, plaintiff, defendant FROM court_cases ORDER BY case_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM court_cases WHERE case_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_title FROM court_cases ORDER BY case_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM case_rulings WHERE ruling_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ruling_date ASC;
SELECT case_title, filing_date FROM court_cases WHERE case_number LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT case_id, ruling_text FROM case_rulings ORDER BY ruling_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE filing_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT case_id, case_title FROM court_cases WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_title LIKE '%criminal%';
SELECT case_id, case_title, filing_date FROM court_cases ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT c.case_id, c.case_title, r.ruling_date FROM court_cases c LEFT JOIN case_rulings r ON c.case_id = r.case_id;
SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_date FROM court_cases ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM court_cases WHERE case_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM rulings JOIN court_cases ON rulings.case_id = court_cases.case_id;
SELECT lawyer_name, practice_area, contact_number FROM lawyers WHERE practice_area = 'Criminal Law';
SELECT * FROM court_cases ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM court_cases WHERE case_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM rulings JOIN court_cases ON rulings.case_id = court_cases.case_id WHERE judge_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT lawyer_name, practice_area FROM lawyers WHERE practice_area = 'Criminal Law' ORDER BY lawyer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_name LIKE '%fraud%' AND case_description LIKE '%money laundering%';
SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_date FROM court_cases ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT count(*) AS total_cases FROM court_cases;
SELECT * FROM case_rulings WHERE ruling_date > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days';
SELECT judge_name, judge_description FROM judges WHERE judge_name LIKE 'Judge%' ORDER BY judge_name;
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT case_id, case_name FROM court_cases WHERE case_name LIKE '%criminal%'
SELECT CASE WHEN judge_name = 'John Doe' THEN 'He is a judge' ELSE 'Not a judge' END AS verdict FROM judges
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_location FROM court_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC
SELECT c.case_name, r.ruling_date, j.judge_name FROM court_cases c JOIN case_rulings r ON c.case_id = r.case_id JOIN judges j ON r.ruling_id = j.judge_id
SELECT * FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_type FROM court_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_date FROM court_cases WHERE case_type = 'criminal';
SELECT * FROM court_rulings ORDER BY ruling_date DESC;
SELECT judge_name, judge_type FROM judges WHERE judge_type = 'senior';
SELECT * FROM court_cases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_name, case_type FROM court_cases WHERE case_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM court_locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT judge_name, judge_type FROM judges WHERE judge_id = 2;
SELECT ruling_id, ruling_date, ruling_type FROM court_rulings WHERE case_id = 1;
